title: quiz-12-arithmetic
author: Phoenix Admission Care
questions: The combined salaries of A and B are Tk. 2000. A spends 95% of his income, while B spends 85% of his. If their savings are the same now, how much does A make?
The size of p is six times that of q. How likely is it that q is less than p?
The tax on the water goes up by 20%, but people use 20% less of it. Then, the increase or decrease in how much money was spent is â€”
What must be added to each term of the ratio 7:13 in order to transform the ratio into 2:3?
The letters of the word SOCIETY are placed at random in a row. The probability of getting a vowel is?
If a man travels 10.2 kilometers in three hours, his distance traveled in five hours is:
If it takes a man four hours to go 15 km, how long will it take him to go 63 km at the same speed?
A boy goes to school at 3 km/hr and comes back to his village at 2 km/hr. If he takes a total of 5 hours, the distance from the village to the school is:
The velocity of a bus is 54 km/hr when it is moving and 45 km/hr when it is stopped. How long does the bus stop for every hour:
A train is going 92.4 kilometers per hour. In 10 minutes, how many meters will it go?
